mapper.select: SELECT * FROM SYS_MESSAGE MSG WHERE MSG.MESSAGE_TYPE = 'EMAIL' AND MSG.SEND_FLAG = 'N' ORDER BY MSG.MESSAGE_ID ASC
SELECT MSG.* FROM SYS_MESSAGE MSG WHERE MSG.MESSAGE_TYPE = 'EMAIL' AND (MSG.PRIORITY_LEVEL IS NULL OR MSG.PRIORITY_LEVEL = 'NORMAL') AND MSG.SEND_FLAG NOT IN ('Y','F','P') ORDER BY MSG.MESSAGE_ID
SELECT MSG.* FROM SYS_MESSAGE MSG WHERE MSG.MESSAGE_TYPE = 'EMAIL' AND MSG.PRIORITY_LEVEL = 'VIP' AND MSG.SEND_FLAG NOT IN ('Y','F','P') ORDER BY MSG.MESSAGE_ID
SELECT MSG.* FROM SYS_MESSAGE MSG WHERE MSG.MESSAGE_TYPE = 'SITE' AND (MSG.PRIORITY_LEVEL IS NULL OR MSG.PRIORITY_LEVEL = 'NORMAL') AND MSG.SEND_FLAG NOT IN ('Y','F','P') ORDER BY MSG.MESSAGE_ID
SELECT MSG.* FROM SYS_MESSAGE MSG WHERE MSG.MESSAGE_TYPE = 'SITE' AND MSG.PRIORITY_LEVEL = 'VIP' AND MSG.SEND_FLAG NOT IN ('Y','F','P') ORDER BY MSG.MESSAGE_ID

SELECT SM.MESSAGE_ID, SM.MESSAGE_TYPE, SM.MESSAGE_HOST, SM.MESSAGE_FROM, SM.SUBJECT, SM.CONTENT, SM.PRIORITY_LEVEL, SM.SEND_FLAG, SM.CREATION_DATE, SM.LAST_UPDATE_DATE FROM SYS_MESSAGE SM
AND SM.SUBJECT LIKE CONCAT('%',CONCAT(#{subject,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%'))
AND SM.MESSAGE_FROM LIKE CONCAT('%',CONCAT(#{messageFrom,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%'))
AND SM.SEND_FLAG = #{sendFlag}
ORDER BY SM.CREATION_DATE DESC
